mutants.code:
def remove_duplicates(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    unique_elements = []
    counts = []
    i = 1
    j = 0
    while i < n:
        while j < n and arr[i] == arr[j]:
            j += 1
        unique_elements.append(arr[i])
        counts.append(j - i)
        i = j
    unique_elements = [x for (_, x) in sorted(zip(counts, unique_elements), reverse=True)]
    counts.sort(reverse=True)
    return unique_elements

    return unique_elements

def remove_duplicates(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    unique_elements = []
    counts = []
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i < n:
        while j < n and arr[i] == arr[j]:
            j += 1
        unique_elements.append(arr[i])
        counts.append(j - i)
        i = j
    unique_elements = [x for (_, x) in sorted(zip(counts, unique_elements), reverse=False)]
    counts.sort(reverse=True)
    return unique_elements
